I was excited about these (purchased several of the solid colors) as I read the reviews and liked the style. The fabric was of nice quality for the price, and the colors were very pretty. Unfortunately, for whatever reason, they were not flattering on me. I'm petite and not sure if that was why. May have been more my body shape; they were a bit boxy on me.  Sadly, I had to return. They might look great on you, though.
This top is sized well, is super cute, and comfortable. I love it.

评论概述: Short on long lined or taller ladies. Doesn't reach hips.
评论详情: Short lined in torso but loved the cap sleeves. Slightly mid weight and well made, just won't  work on long lined torso or taller ladies. The red I ordered is a bluer red and darker, not an orange red bright shade.  Returning.
This top is so cute. Exactly as pictured. Fits perfectly. Haven't had a chance to wear. Thinking of buying a striped one for my summer wardrobe.
Love these shirts, purchased in several colors. Nice fit, a touch longer which is nice too
Love the cap sleeves! More classy than a typical T shirt! Purchased in a few colors! Definitely a girls closet staple!

评论概述: I bought one in every color

The top is cute even though I thought yhe fabric would be different. The biggest issues is the shirt is smaller than the description. I followed the size guide for my measurements and th top was still very small.
Love this as an undershirt with a jacket or cardigan. Could size down

Soft cotton tee and no see through fabric.
Great quality. Can dress up or down. Lock so much about four different colors.

I like the fabric, but the stripes are way off.
Love but kept little larger one . Must had a baby
Looks good and great fit

Wife says: I was hesitant to buy this because of the fabric under the armpits, but that is also why I wanted to try it. I have it in multiple colors and it is my go to. The fabric is thicker, but not heavy and cap sleeves are perfect for a more finished look. The colors are exactly as shown and wash well.

The shirt has a nice weight to it, but is comfortable and soft enough.  I was concerned about the fit because I do have a larger chest, but my regular size for me nicely.  The short actually looks better than I expected.
Cute basic white shirt. I do like that there is material that come up higher in the arm holes to cover a bra.
Really nice top.  I have gotten many compliments on this top.  Worth the $$.  Good quality fabric.
Love this shirt and can dress up or down! Perfect to layer with a blue Jean jacket! Got a large! I weigh 170 and 5’7 !
sleeves are uneven and the pattern does not match

It perfectly fit to me. The material is soft and actually I ordered the pink one too in the same company. I ordered the same style from other company because I can’t find the color I wanted but the material is not as soft as the first one.
I got this pretty quickly but it had two shades of white. Horrible quality. I returned it.

评论概述: Tee shirt fabric and seam finishes
评论详情: I never learn that I am always disappointed in Amazon clothing. The beautiful crimson color of this top attracted me. Its style is appealing. However the fabric is like a tee shirt material and so is the finishing of seams.  I had wanted to use this as a holiday top but not "fancy" enough. Guess it's going back. Disappointed.
This shirt wears and washes well. The fabric is a good quality - not too thin!
This shirt is so comfortable and easy to wear. The sleeve detail transforms a basic tee into a dressy top. Many people have commented on how cute this top is.
I really like this top. Comfortable and sized well. Material is soft with body.

The quality is good and I like that it has the extra material to cover your bra (underarms) but the sleeve fits weird as it sticks out. I’m 5’2 and 120 lbs and went with the small. The length was off for me as I like the length longer and this fell just below my waist. I hate the return process so I’ll stay with it.
Love this shirt! The material is thick and I love the underarm shields so you don’t see a bra or side boob.
The style, fabric and quality is great.  It was unfortunately much too large for me.I ordered a small and I am 5' 2".  Sizing is the only reason I gave it 4 stars.
Great product and value for the price
I bought this shirt for my daughter and she wears it often.

I purchased this shirt previously in a medium and it fit great. In fact I liked it so much I bought two more (black and white!). What I love about the shirts is the coverage you get under the armpit - really great feature to have that additional fabric there. The white is not see thru which I also appreciate. However I really think they changed the fit/size of the shirt! The medium in these new ones I got feels bigger and is definitely longer. Would have considered returning for a small, but had already washed etc since I had a medium before.
Love the shirt for layering and underneath sweaters.

评论概述: Cute top and has held up well.
评论详情: The biggest issue I have when buying clothes on amazon is that often times the quality is not great and clothes start peeling and shrinking after a couple of washes. I have had this top for about 3-4 months now and have washed it often, and it still looks great. It hasn't shrunk either.

When I tried on the shirt, it caused a burning feeling on my skin that lasted for hours. I only had it on for less than a minute. No idea what was on the fabric but have never had clothing affect my skin that way.

Great color and comfortable top! I bought this one after purchasing the striped one. I appreciate the side panel under the arms so it’s appropriate for work without having to layer to cover my bra. Easy laundering with no shrinkage! The fabric is a great weight. Fits true to size.
Cute, nice material.
This ran a bit bigger than anticipated, but I like how it laid regardless. I like this for a basic/solid work shirt.  I will be purchasing more colors.
This simple little t-shirt is so cute and flattering! I like how there's an underarm panel like a regular t-shirt so you don't accidentally flash anybody. It's like an elevated tank. Very cute.
Very awkward fit. Looks like I cut the sleeves myself.
This is a great piece that I should be able to layer with in the cooler months. The fit is TTS and it was not see through.
I returned this because it is not flattering on my body type but the construction was very impressive and high quality for Amazon.
Love the fit and washed well.
I get a lot of compliments on the shirt. It is a little bit thicker which I like, but not too thick. I would buy it again.

High quality and cute!
This fits very awkwardly and feels like it has been starched heavily.
The shirt is really cute, but it’s thick and form fitting. Order your true size or bigger if you like it to be loose.
Love this top. It fits well and is made of a nicely weighted fabric that’s soft and not see through. It’s a great value for the money. I’m buying it in additional colors.
I wore this through the end of summer and into early fall. It’s adorable and goes with a lot of different bottoms making it a versatile staple for multiple different styles.
It’s too small. Seems well made but doesn’t fit my normal size.

These are so nice looking. I bought several. They are soft and wash up well, no shrinking, etc. there is a gusset under the arm so there is no bra showing!
Love this top! I’ve worn it several times and it washes & dries great. It can be dressed up or down.
It looks great, fits great but did shrink a little more than I hoped. Still ok for now.
I love this shirt. It’s so versatile. I can dress it up for work or down for a night out.
I love that it has a under sleve cover. Will buy more

High quality. This is a good product.
The material is really nice and soft. Runs true to size. Would definitely buy again.
This shirt is shorter than I thought it would be and I do not have a long torso.

Absolutely love the extra material right where most shirt companies leave it bare, allowing one’s bra to show as if that’s the design. Fit well, a little long due to me being petite, good material and great red color. Came packaged well so all I had to do was hang it to get the wrinkles out. May order more colors!
This shirt is very nicely made.  I love the cap detail on the shoulder and the underarm piece so it does not show bra.  I have been using it with a jacket, and I love it! Maryanne
Not the roomy longer look as shown in pictures. More fitted and my midriff showed when I raised my arms
Fitted and straight
The cuts are a little different. A black striped L fit the same as the white striped XL, the solid white XL was a little big and boxy. It’s worth getting 2 sizes. The tops are cute on, soft material.
I really like this top. Nice quality and I always get compliments when I wear it.
The fit could have been a little looser but the material was fabulous.
I love this tee. I wish I had bought a size larger but this one does fit, I just like extra loose clothing. Quality is great.
Adorable top perfect to wear in summer. Fits well and the sleeves are super cute. I get a lot of compliments on it and it will go with jeans or white pants or shorts.

This top is made really well. It was recommended to me by a couple of friends as being a great wardrobe staple, and I can see their point. I bought it in two colors. This will sound strange, but for some reason, it isn't super flattering on me. I haven't quite figured out why, but gave it 5 stars anyway because the quality is there.
This top is very true to size and is so cute! Every time I wear it, I get lots of compliments and it’s great quality!
A great T-shirt at a fabulous price you can’t go wrong with this one.

I ordered a medium and a large. I'm keeping both. I'm 5'5", about 165 lb, big boobs. Both sizes fit me. The shirt is a boxy fit and i like the medium for a more structured, dressier look and the large will be cute dressed more casually maybe with Jean shorts. For the price you can't go wrong! My only complaint is the medium in green came with what looked like dog hair on it. I was kind of grossed out but tried it on anyway. I liked it so threw it in the wash and it washed up perfectly 👍❤️
It's a little body, but I love the sleeves

The material was not what I expected. I started a return and completed the return but have received notification the product was not returned. So, I do not have the product that I paid for and the return must be lost.
Love the fit and sleeves

Love this shirt. It's not tight, but has a nice stretch to it and it's soft. Really appreciate the extra fabric in the armpit area to keep my bra from being visible, which is typically a big problem for me since I am petite. Added bonus, it came vacuum sealed, which made it easy to pack for a trip. I was taking it on!
Great basic staple
It covers what you want it to cover and I don’t have pretty arms so this draws the eye towards the shirts pretty shoulder design. Just buy it
Good quality and such a nice fit!! Love the extra material they added for the gap under the arms!!
Well made. True fit. Have bought more than one color. Price is fair. Fabric is substative. Colors don't fade.  What more could you want?

Not as comfortable as I hoped. Kind of bunches up.
These tops are really comfortable and I love them.
Worn several times and washed well
I really like this top and would definitely buy again. Soft and extremely comfortable.

The picture for this shirt must be of the one and only good top they produced. The sleeve adornment  on the top I received did not even cover the arm opening. I normally wear a US L/XL depending on how loose I want the drape. I ordered 3 tops from this dealer in large as per the sites suggestion. One out of them fit while the others were so small my 8 yr old grand daughter would have had trouble getting them on. The buyer should beware but Amazon could do a better job vetting their suppliers.
Wish they had more colors made with cotton

Unfortunately, it is poorly made and already has the thread at the bottom of the shirt (hemline?) pulling and no longer is there on one side. It has only been washed 2 times! It is too bad because I really liked the look and fit of this top.
Looks great as a layering piece or even on its own. Super comfortable and a great length.
